Detailed Description

Exposes methods to operate with hooks (e.g:attach, detach, enable,etc).

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktHook::AddCustomHandler ( [in] BSTR  handlerDll,
[in] LONG  handlerFlags,
[in] BSTR  parameters 
)

Adds a custom handler DLL with optional user-defined function parameters.

Parameters
handlerDllThe DLL that will handle function calls intercepted by this hook.
handlerFlagsThe hook handler flags, any combination of eNktHookCustomHandlerFlags
parametersOptional user defined string parameters to pass when Deviare calls the OnHookAdded DLL function.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if handlerDll is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG is handlerDll is an empty string.
Remarks
The handler DLL should export a number of predefined functions for SpyMgr to call the DLL functions properly. The C++ signatures of such functions are:
extern "C" HRESULT WINAPI OnLoad();
extern "C" HRESULT WINAPI OnUnload();
extern "C" HRESULT WINAPI OnHookAdded(__in INktHookInfo *lpHookInfo, __in DWORD dwChainIndex, __in LPCWSTR szParametersW);
extern "C" HRESULT WINAPI OnHookRemoved(__in INktHookInfo *lpHookInfo, __in DWORD dwChainIndex);
extern "C" HRESULT WINAPI OnFunctionCall(__in INktHookInfo *lpHookInfo, __in DWORD dwChainIndex, __in INktHookCallInfoPlugin *lpHookCallInfoPlugin);
HRESULT INktHook::Attach ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync 
)

Attaches hook to a process.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying to which process to attach. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if specified process does not exist.
E_INVALIDARG if process ID is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if an internal out of memory error has occured.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHook::Destroy ( )

Destroys the hook and detaches from processes.

Returns
S_OK on success.
HRESULT INktHook::Detach ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync 
)

Detaches hook from process.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying to which process to attach. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if specified process does not exist.
NKT_DVERR_Cancelled if asynchronous detach operation was cancelled.
E_INVALIDARG if process ID is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if an internal out of memory error has occured.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHook::Enable ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  enable,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync 
)

Enables or disables an attached process.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying to which process to attach. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
enableTRUE to enable hook.
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if specified process does not exist.
NKT_DVERR_Cancelled if asynchronous detach operation was cancelled.
E_INVALIDARG if process ID is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if an internal out of memory error has occured.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHook::Flags ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the current flags.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to receive a combination of eNktHookFlags
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHook::FunctionName ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the function name this hook was set to intercept.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to receive the function name string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided buffer has insufficient space.
HRESULT INktHook::Hook ( [in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync)

Activate the hook in all processes.

Parameters
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL if this hook is not active.
HRESULT INktHook::Id ( [out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal)
get

Get the hook id.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to receive the value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHook::LastError ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[out, retval] LONG *  pVal 
)

Get the state of the hook in the specified process.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying process to query. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to receive last error value.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHook::QueryOverwrite ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[out, retval] VARIANT_BOOL *  pVal 
)

Checks if the hook was overwritten in the specified process.

Parameters
[in]procOrIdVariant specifying process to query. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
[out]pValAddress of pointer to receive the boolean result.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHook::RemoveAllHandlers ( )

Removes all the local and custom handlers from this hook.

Returns
S_OK on success.
HRESULT INktHook::State ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[out, retval] eNktHookState *  pVal 
)

Returns the state of the hook regarding the specified process.

Parameters
[in]procOrIdVariant specifying process to query. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
[out]pValAddress of pointer to receive an eNktHookState constant value.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHook::Unhook ( [in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync)

Deactivate the hook in all processes.

Parameters
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL if this hook is not active.
